Class ParentalSettings

java.lang.Object
group33.VirtualPet.src.main.model.ParentalSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ParentalSettings extends Object implements Serializable
Manages parental control settings and play time tracking for the Virtual Pet game. Implements Serializable to allow saving and loading of settings.
Since:
Winter 2025
Author:
Team 33 (Dhir, Kostya, Fatima, Anna)
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ParentalSettings()
    Constructs default parental settings with: - Time restrictions disabled - Default play window: current time to +2 hours - All time counters zeroed

  • Constructor Details

    • ParentalSettings

      public ParentalSettings()
      Constructs default parental settings with: - Time restrictions disabled - Default play window: current time to +2 hours - All time counters zeroed

  • Method Details

    • isTimeRestrictionEnabled

      public boolean isTimeRestrictionEnabled()
      Checks if time restrictions are enabled.
      Returns:
      true if time restrictions are active

    • setTimeRestrictionEnabled

      public void setTimeRestrictionEnabled(boolean timeRestrictionEnabled)
      Enables or disables time restrictions.
      Parameters:
      timeRestrictionEnabled - true to enable restrictions

    • getAllowedStartTime

      public LocalTime getAllowedStartTime()
      Gets the allowed start time for play sessions.
      Returns:
      The earliest allowed play time

    • setAllowedStartTime

      public void setAllowedStartTime(LocalTime allowedStartTime)
      Sets the allowed start time for play sessions.
      Parameters:
      allowedStartTime - The new start time

    • getAllowedEndTime

      public LocalTime getAllowedEndTime()
      Gets the allowed end time for play sessions.
      Returns:
      The latest allowed play time

    • setAllowedEndTime

      public void setAllowedEndTime(LocalTime allowedEndTime)
      Sets the allowed end time for play sessions.
      Parameters:
      allowedEndTime - The new end time

    • getTotalPlayTime

      public Duration getTotalPlayTime()
      Gets the total accumulated play time.
      Returns:
      The sum of all play sessions

    • setTotalPlayTime

      public void setTotalPlayTime(Duration totalPlayTime)
      Sets the total play time (used when loading saved settings).
      Parameters:
      totalPlayTime - The new total play time

    • startSession

      public void startSession()
      Starts a new play session by recording the current time.

    • endSession

      public void endSession()
      Ends the current play session and updates statistics. Calculates session duration and adds it to totals.

    • addSessionTime

      public void addSessionTime(Duration sessionTime)
      Adds a session duration to the accumulated totals. Filters out sessions longer than 24 hours as invalid.
      Parameters:
      sessionTime - The duration to add

    • getAverageSessionTime

      public Duration getAverageSessionTime()
      Calculates the average session duration.
      Returns:
      Average duration or ZERO if no sessions recorded

    • getSessionCount

      public int getSessionCount()
      Gets the total number of play sessions.
      Returns:
      Count of completed sessions

    • resetPlayTimeStatistics

      public void resetPlayTimeStatistics()
      Resets all play time statistics to zero.

    • isTimeAllowed

      public boolean isTimeAllowed(String screenType)
      Checks if the current time is allowed for play based on settings.
      Parameters:
      screenType - The context ("playing" or other screens)
      Returns:
      true if playing is allowed, false if restricted

    • getLastSessionStart

      public LocalDateTime getLastSessionStart()
      Gets the start time of the last session.
      Returns:
      Session start timestamp or null if no active session

    • getLastSessionEnd

      public LocalDateTime getLastSessionEnd()
      Gets the end time of the last completed session.
      Returns:
      Session end timestamp or null if no completed sessions

    • getCurrentSessionDuration

      public Duration getCurrentSessionDuration()
      Calculates the duration of the current active session.
      Returns:
      Current session duration or ZERO if no active session
